name: Kiwik
description:
An endless runner about a Kiwi who dreams of flying. His aim is to collect as many cherries and kiwis as during the day and avoid deadly obstacles. At night the obstacles switch and he now needs to avoid the items he once strived for as they've turned poisonous.

Created for the Global Game Jam 2022

Development and Programming by Jajav33 and Treecki

Art by Fizziberry and Sorie Kim
